ایسوسی ایشن فار کمپیوٹیشنل لنگویسٹکس کی کانفرنس 2021 کب ہوئی؟ Association for Computational Linguistics 2021 conference date

Welcome to ACL-IJCNLP 2021! The Joint Conference of the 59th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics and the 11th International Joint Conference on Natural Language Processing (ACL-IJCNLP 2021) will be held in Bangkok, Thailand, during August 1-6, 2021.
Largest conference in natural language processing Association for Computational Linguistics conference size

Major Conferences ___ACL (Association for Computational Linguistics): This is one of the premier conferences in the field, focusing on all aspects of computational linguistics and NLP. ... ___EMNLP (Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing): EMNLP is known for its emphasis on empirical methods in NLP.
Largest conference in natural language processing Association for Computational Linguistics conference size

In recent years, ACL conferences have enjoyed a growth spurt. We estimate that ACL will attract 4000-6000 paying attendees, EMNLP will attract 3000-4000 attendees, NAACL will attract 2500-3000 attendees, and EACL will attract 1000-1500 attendees.
